text.__SUMMARY__: Solanum fallax is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae. It is found in Colombia and Ecuador.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Solanum fallax". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T35472A9934475. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T35472A9934475.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
